sections.title: React Learning Path
sections.description: A comprehensive guide to mastering React, from basics to advanced concepts.

items.title: Introduction to React
items.description: Learn the fundamentals of React, Virtual DOM, and its component-based philosophy

items.title: React Fundamentals
items.description: Explore components, JSX, props, state, events, and conditional rendering in React

items.title: React Hooks
items.description: Master React hooks including useState, useEffect, useContext, useReducer, and custom hooks

items.title: Component Lifecycle and Rendering
items.description: Understand component lifecycle, rendering process, and optimization techniques

items.title: State Management in React
items.description: Learn various state management approaches from local state to Redux and server state
